Title: Relates to prohibiting certain practices by code enforcement officers
Summary: Prohibits the use of certain interactive, live feed technology by code enforcement officers conducting inspections.
LawCode: Add §§17-302 & 20-120, NYC Ad Cd; add §1312, Pub Health L; amd §381, Exec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, the public health law and the executive law, in relation to prohibiting the use of certain devices or technology during the conduct of inspections
